name: The Secrets of Atlantis - The Sacred Legacy HD
name_original: The Secrets of Atlantis - The Sacred Legacy HD
description:
New York, 1937. Howard Brooks steps aboard the Hindenburg zeppelin...
An assault, a destiny altered forever. Discover a secret hidden since the dawn of time!

THE ADVENTURE
New York, 1937. When Howard Brooks steps aboard the Hindenburg zeppelin, he doesn't realize that his life is about to be transformed. The victim of an assault, he finds himself caught up in an incredible adventure that will lead him to the four corners of the earth, on the search for Atlantis!
Are you ready to follow Howard in this quest scattered with a thousand dangers, and bring to light a secret hidden since the dawn of time, at the risk of your own life?

THE GAME
A Point&Click adventure using 360° vision technology in every scene.
The game is not a copycat portage of the PC version but an adaptation for touch screens and mobile platforms.

THE HIGHLIGHTS
• All voices and texts in English!
• A thrilling quest with a wealth of twists and turns
• An invitation to travel: Aboard the zeppelin, set out on a journey around the world
• The production, inspired directly by the world of cinema, creates a fascinating atmosphere
• About thirty characters, both good and evil, accompany you on your adventure
• The soundtrack, kinematics and charismatic characters guarantee a captivating adventure
